turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Trading stamp culture in Hong Kong.
turn.1: What are the different applications of the Trading stamp culture in Hong Kong?
turn.2: For certain occasions, some shops will offer several series of products to be redeemed in the same promotion period, and the stamps given to customers are universal for redeeming those products.
turn.3: What are the most common applications?
turn.4: Chain restaurants usually offer free food, shopping discounts or lucky draws for customers to redeem by collecting stamps.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: People set up different platforms that can help stamp collectors collect stamps to redeem products.
turn.7: What are some of these specialized applications?
turn.8: Some online forums allow people to exchange stamps from different shops.
turn.9: Is there any other specialized applications?
turn.10: Besides, there is a market of the products from stamp collection because some people may not be able to redeem the whole set of products after the promotion period has passed as they may not have enough or not want to spend time on collecting stamps.
turn.11: Is there a market for these?
turn.12: Although they might be expensive, the market still appeals to those people who would rather spend their money on those collections.
